website_summaries.verdict: A smart power strip that works perfectly with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
pros: Comes with a free "Smart Life" app so you can control the power strip with your smartphone or tablet
Enables you to schedule your appliances to turn on or off at any time
Comes with 4 outlets and 4 USB ports
Enables you to control each outlet individually
cons: May intermittently cut power off and turn it back on

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this zero’s if I could have! These are pure junk! First one fried with the first power surge we had after only a couple weeks. Bought a second one and the same thing happened. Save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Shorted & Won't Allow to Pair!!
customer_reviews.text: ZERO Stars. I waited all this time to receive an item that when I plugged it in the wall...sparks shot out of the USB ports. The blue light wouldn't flash but 2-3 seconds, not long enough to pair with my Galaxy Note 8. It's dead!! I'll be seeking a refund or be placement.
customer_reviews.author: Be'Jammin

customer_reviews.title: Easy set -up,  multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: You can individually set timers, schedules, or remotely control devices via the app . Perfect fit controlling Xbox, tv, lamps, ECT. It has a separate app. Lifetime warranty with review.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A. Canham

customer_reviews.title: very convenient and save space!
customer_reviews.text: Before i used to have a regular AC outlets that when i need charge multiple device and have my TV, ps4, phones, ipads, heater printer ect... some of the plug of the devices i got is too big, so i can barely use all 8 at the same time, i would have to compromise with what i got. But this outlet is amazing i don't have the same problem anymore, because when i need my charge my phones and tablets i dont have to plug in with an adapter anymore, all i need is a USB cable to charge my phones, because it comes with 4 USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: browillie

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this smart strip to power and set up timers for my salt water reef tank. So far it’s working great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use iPhone to control the power
customer_reviews.text: With this power strips, it can connect with my IPhone under the WiFi, that’s so convenient. I can control my room light before I go to my room and turn off the appliances when I was on the bed! That’s so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hoode

customer_reviews.title: Product is good
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for 2days, it works well. But it’s not easy to connect with the app, because too many similar name. Overall i recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Lang

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package it looked like a decent product and it was simple to connect to via my Wi-Fi. However, upon plugging my devices into it, I could tell that there was practically no connection (friction) with the plugs. Since the plugs would barely stay plugged in, I decided to take it apart. Upon inspection I was surprised at how thin the brass strips are. Because the brass is so thin it provides very little tension on the plug contacts. I’m sure taking it apart voids the warranty, but I consider the device to be defective and even unsafe due to potential arcing between the contacts. I am returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Home guy

customer_reviews.title: So far it has been working just fine for me. It is like get 5 Alexa compatible devices in 1
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been working just fine for me. It is like get 5 alexa compatible devices in 1. You can name each Power plug differently and can be controlled individually or as a whole.. or in any combination with Alexa groups. The only down is the the app is not currently compatible with my Google Pixel 2 xl. It works on Nexus 5x and Samsung S7 though.. Hopefully the app gets updated soon.
customer_reviews.author: Leon R. Situ

customer_reviews.title: Does as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was simple to connect. It works well. Just keep in mind that devices without switches cannot be told to turn on, only off. We setup a Christmas extravaganza but were unable to get our light projector to work with it since it has a button that doesn't click into on position. Otherwise, we have experienced no connectivity issues as of yet. I will be back if this changes.
customer_reviews.author: ttbloodlusttt

customer_reviews.title: Won't play nice with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: I love the the idea of the device. One smart surge protector for up to 4 standard power outlets and a single for USB. The setup was pretty easy and it worked flawlessly with Alexa, until a few weeks ago. It suddenly stopped responding to Alexa commands eventually stopped working with the Smart Life app altogether. It'll work for a moment after I resync everything to Smartlife and Alexa, but it seems to unsync itself every single time from Alexa. I want to like it, but it just won't play nice with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Mutt_1990

customer_reviews.title: I have a few other smart plugs that I have around they house and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a few other smart plugs that I have around they house and they are all great but this thing takes the cake. I use it in my garage for my homebrewing setup. I have my pumps hooked up to transfer beer during the process. The app works pretty good and I have it synced up to the goodle home I have in the garage. It works like a dream. I can shut my pumps off just by talking to my Google home great for solo brew days. In top of that I have my air compressor and garage fan all tied into it so my garage is getting automated along with the rest of the home. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Logan McKay

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this cause no matter how many times I tried to get it to work the way it’s supposed to. It just won’t do. Can not get it to connect to my WiFi
customer_reviews.author: John Speller

customer_reviews.title: Amazon tablet and surge protector trashed. Maybe time to go walmart. Miss tablet, upgraded phone.
customer_reviews.text: Had this about 3 months to protect tablet & cell phone. Woke up one morn and went to unplug. Crazy looking lights and sparks hit fingers. Amazon tablet and so called surge protector both were trashed. Do not enjoy wasting funds for what bad products we buy here. Very disappointed in whole debacle with this company. Several items this yr. Went to trash. Will find other places to shop perhaps. Amazon does nothing for small price items that waste our money to return item. To the trash they go.
customer_reviews.author: Talldarkangel

customer_reviews.title: Love the independent outlets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a hydroponic grow system, and I wanted to be able to set timers and/or routines using Alexa. This enables me to run different elements of my grow system without having to worry about remembering to set a timer, or accidentally turning something off/on that should not have been turned off/on. This purchase was a win, and I will definitely be purchasing more of these for general purpose electronics around the household. The USB ports are not independent, something to consider if you are looking to purchase. However, I still like the USB ports built into the protector, because if necessary I can charge my phone, or any other device, while I'm working in the grow area.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive addition to your home IoT
customer_reviews.text: I kept my expectations in check given the low cost but installation and use were top notch. Time will tell on durability but for now these are an inexpensive way to expand your home IoT. Set up was straightforward and instructions clear. I had some concern over the strength of my wifi signal where I was installing the Jinvoo Smart Power Strip but it connected without a problem and after loading the app, was operating as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Alexa enabled outlets that can also be on a schedule.
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part was figuring out which actual app to use to set this thing up. A little confusing. After that, though; working great thus far. Alexa works well with it; can do numerous (groups) or individuals by voice control - and (important for me) the app allows one to schedule individual outlets. Using one for a nightlight - but Alexa can still turn it on or off and override the preset. More cost effective (and smaller footprint) than buying numerous plugs (which I also have done). Haven't used the USB's so I can't speak to them; though they look like they work...can also be controlled.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mendelowitz

customer_reviews.title: Works like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I had trouble setting this up at first is because I already had the add on program for Alexa installed for another device I was no longer using and for some reason it unsyched. I just unlinked and relinked it and then the setup went like it should. I set up the app on my phone which I don't know if I needed to do, but then I also did it through the amazon Alexa app. Works exactly like it is supposed to. I really like that each switch is considered a separate device, so you can just have one on at a time if you wanted to. I want to get another one for Christmas decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bucholz

customer_reviews.title: Good value, very convenient to have individually named sockets
customer_reviews.text: This was a little difficult to set up at first, as the Android app would not load for me despite multiple attempts. Finally got the iOS app loaded through husband's iPhone, but the device still had to be added manually. After that I was able to enable the Alexa skill and set it up without too much difficulty. I like that each socket can be named; perfect for things like a lamp, the Christmas tree, wax warmer, etc. Have had no issues pairing with Alexa after the initial setup. My main complaint is with the Android app, though maybe that has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning this
customer_reviews.text: I love my smart plugs and I should have stuck with the same brand however I do like to try new products to see what else is out there. Their customer service is great as they do respond. In fact they do ask you for in touch with them before posting a review, however this plug was not able to pick up my WiFi and I did all the standard restart tactics .. so will be returning this product
customer_reviews.author: Ayeshah Alam Khan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with phone, laptop, and TV
customer_reviews.text: Really needed more plugs for my living room, since there's always a problem if there is more than one person who wants to use their laptop, plug in a game, and charge their phone. I tried the usb port with my Samsung lightening cable for my phone, and it worked just as good as usual-convenient so my friends don't need to bring around matching adaptors. The spacing is very convenient for my laptop to have room next to the TV plug, amd now I can extend it and reach the hdmi port at the same time. The cable has a good amount of reach but it's thick and won't tangle, overall worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lau

customer_reviews.title: Such a waste.  DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item twice. The first one never properly connected to my Alexa and I returned it. Thinking that I just got one defective unit and surely it wouldn’t happen again, I ordered a second. This one will allow me to control one plug outlet but not the other three nor the USB outlets. And the one it will allow me to control is one I have nothing plugged into! I have called Alexa support and they couldn’t figure it out either. Looks like this one is going back too! And this time I won’t be trying it again! Try another company. Don’t order this model. Such a waste of my time!
customer_reviews.author: C'villeMomOf5

customer_reviews.title: DUD
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH FOR A SMART SURGE PROTECTOR, IT HAS NEVER CONNECTED TO ANYTHING BUT THE WALL OUTLET
customer_reviews.author: edwin f ortiz

customer_reviews.title: It’s a crap shoot if you can get it to work with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this power strip but once plugged in it became a nightmare. Cannot get Alexa to recognize individual plugs for control. Alexa will only turn on the strip and the first switch. Spent nearly an hour with Alexa tech support and nearly pulled my hair out. They could not help me one bit. Just kept telling me to delete and reinstall. Finally just hung up because she put me on hold and never came back. So disappointed with the strip and Alexa support. Have sent multiple emails and chats and no one has responded. I am going to try a different brand and hope for better results.
customer_reviews.author: D Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Mine malfunctioned in about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on March 29, 2018 and was satisfied until it started malfunctioning on or about July 4th and could no longer be successfully restarted.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Decatur

customer_reviews.title: Different app to connect to google home
customer_reviews.text: Its a little cumbersome to program. you need to program each outlet individually (nice) but it would be better if you could program the entire strip as one schedule if you wanted. Set up was easy. There was an issue connecting it to google home. the app that it said to connect with was not on the list. I contacted the seller and they told me the new app to connect with is the "smart Life"
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a power supplyb ut no connectivity for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to connect this product to my WiFi router and therefore Alexa. My router is dual 2.4 and 5ghz. The power supplied by the unit was satisfactory but the functionality was limited since it couldn't be connected to my router. I've connected other devices of both 2.4ghz and 5ghz to my Alexa with problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Google Home
customer_reviews.text: You had to download a separate app to try to use this feature however once downloaded it did not pick up the right setting so it would not work. It's also States that Google and alexo work with it however my Google home could not pick it up either I don't have a Lexus or I couldn't tell if Alexa works or not. After 15 minutes of fooling with it I decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this smart power strip for about 2 weeks. I bought it because I have an espresso maker that I tend to accidently leave on as I rush out the door in the morning. Not the end of the world, but I really don't want to leave it on all day, for no reason. This power strip has eliminated that issue, for me. I have 4 items plugged into it. A drip coffee maker, espresso maker, grinder, and a hot water kettle. I can turn any or all plugs on just using the Smart app on my phone. Works as advertised and I am very pleased. If anything changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Richkev

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Sync with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: After about 4 days of troubleshooting I returned this item because I could not get Alexa to recognize it consistently. When Alexa did recognize it, it was only as 1 entire device not as individual plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Hylidae66

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got the Hey Value smart strip and I am not impressed. Set up took several tries because it kept timing out. While the Smart Life app worked well with the individual sockets, Alexa could only turn socket 1 off and on, she did not recognize the other three. I have spent all day trying to fix this and just gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Plumley

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this company is getting so many 5 star reviews for this product. You can tell right away that its very low quality, the plugs are really loose so they wiggle around, wifi never worked as well as nothing worked that was plugged in via socket or USB. So disappointed I will be returning right away, I would give this negative 5 stars if I could!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with app/but product doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Update: so after my warranty expired the power strip shorted out, reached out to the company and never heard back, very sad because is absolutely loved this power strip,I will not be buying a new one. I have given the company plenty of time to get back with me. It’s complicated to get your Alexa to work if your not tech savvy. If it wasn’t for someone who made a review with step by step instructions to do so i would have never been able to get it to work with my Alexa. Setting the surge protector to wifi was simple
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a power strip that I could have Alexa control each plug. What I got was a plastic box with 4 plugs and 4 USB outlets. The USB outlets are good and tight. They work very well except all four are either "on" or "off" when controlled by Alexa. The 4 electrical plugs can be controlled independently or the power strip can controlled as a single unit. The BIG problem is with the electrical plugs. They are made very poorly. Plugs remain loose when plugged in which does not instill confidence in this consumer. I would not recommend this product unless you can fix this problem safely.
customer_reviews.author: Skipatr107

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back
customer_reviews.text: I got it all set up When I asked Alexa to turn on the light Alexa responded right away "OK" then nothing happens. I worked on this for over 5 hours. Got Amazon customer service in chat. That was 30 minutes of wasted time. Everything said it was setup successfully. The red light stayed on all the time. Got more then frustrated with it. Thought I better just send it back rather then taking a hammer to it. It is all packed up and ready to go back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: k---h

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the short time it lasts
customer_reviews.text: This smart power strip is great once you’re eventually able to get it setup. The setup process is extremely frustrating and I almost gave up after trying for over an hour to get it to connect. But when you do get it, it works well. For a little while. After about 3 months, one of the plugs quit working and after 6 months, the entire thing won’t turn on. I had many devices plugged in and programmed using the strip and now the entire thing is broken. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi R

customer_reviews.title: Uses the SmartHome app
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of apps required with different smart devices but I like how this strip aligns with the Smart Home app. If you didn't know this app is recognized by Google Home. Each individual plug on the strip is controllable through voice control and in the mornings I can turn on my coffee maker without turning on the TV at the same time. The plugs are spaced wide enough to accommodate thick plugs to prevent under utilization caused by overcrowding of plugs. The dedicated USBs work well to charge my peripherals without taking up appliances that require the grounded plug connector.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great smart strip!
customer_reviews.text: For the price and functionality this strip is great! It has only 2 issues. 1) For some reason whatever u plug into it the fit isn't snug at all. Its very easy to pull cords out of this thing. It has not wall mount slots in the back for mounting. Most all strips have mounts but this one doesn't. It not a deal breaker and I managed to hang mine up regardless but the slots would have come in handy.. 2)
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of use, I decided to return this product but changed my mind and gave it a chance. I have to move it around and it has to sit at a certain position so it would work. So frustrating and I got tired of it. Now I cannot return anymore since it's past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: PrudyMax

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works, which is _most_ of the time
customer_reviews.text: I got this power strip to control some of our lights via phone/voice for when we get home after dark. When it works, it's great. However, every month or two it just stops working (which is a special thrill when the house is completely dark and it no longer responds), and you have to unplug it for a little before plugging it back in, at which point it works again. Would be nice if it was a little more reliable, but it's still pretty handy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nilsen

customer_reviews.title: Alexa is so frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Alexa will only recognize 1 of the plugs. I tried resetting the surge protector, deleting and re-downloading the Alexa app.... 3 times!!! After two hours of troubleshooting and looking things up on YouTube (there is very little) I called the Alexa support number and they didn’t know the brand at all and said they’d call back within 48 hours. The app for the surge protector works great and is super user friendly but I bought this specifically for Alexa who will only recognize it as a single plug so I’m so frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: It's must HAVE if You use a laptop as home work station
customer_reviews.text: For my work I use LAPTOP as Work station, the worst thing here it's: if you keep pluged in the laptop all the time , that Kills the laptop battery, To save the laptop battery you have to use in cycles of charging. I was tired doing that. I found this strip where you can do your own schedulle , and it's amazing , now when I'm going to sleep the power strip will shut off all my work station by it self. Work's perfect I like it
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Made in China.  Does not work!  Look for another product.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today, plugged it in and NOTHING. I pushed the power button for 5 seconds like the cheesy directions say to do, everything flashed for a milisecond and then "NOTHING". I can't get to the set up part because this piece of crap will not power on. I tried it multiple times, tried unplugging several times and trying again. NOTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Sets Up Easily with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: *update* Had this less than eight months and it just crapped out on me. So, while i loved it while i had it, I'll probably look for something else next time :( I bought one of these for myself and then for my husband. We use them in the bedroom to control various devices. It was an easy set-up to go with Alexa. I've only had one time where it stopped working and I *might* have dropped a glass on the button. I can't be sure. But, I just removed the device and added it back in and boom! No trouble. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: TXEggplant

customer_reviews.title: BAD :( Only 1 plug is compatible with voice control constantly goes offline.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that voice control only applies to one outlet on the power strip. To use the other outlets and the USB ports you have to open the app. Constantly goes offline. So it is just a big hassle not a time saver. Set up was a little time consuming. I thought this had a flat plug, not one that sticks out from the wall a few inches. I would rather have a smart plug that was fully usable with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: stylishly smart
customer_reviews.text: 6 foot long power strip is not the cheapest by itself. But given the price of ~$26 and a smart one, it is definitely a deal. there are 4 regular outlet arranged in enough space so that even a larger size plug would do without blocking the socket next to it. 4 usb outlets with output of 2A each, very useful for android phone chargers. In addition to compatible with Amazon Alexia or Google Home App, it is compatible with Tuya App, just like a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: WL

customer_reviews.title: Best smart device to voice control with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Love this, out of all the things I’ve tried with Alexa this by far works the best. It was easy to pair with Alexa, and you can use different sockets on it and name each of them something different to tell Alexa to turn on or off. The only thing I would improve on is adding a usb-c port instead of all usb and being able to use each port separately with Alexa voice control would be cool. Overall very excited about this power strip!
customer_reviews.author: alyssacoss

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. This item was exactly as described, the reviews helped assist me in selecting this particular one and they did not disappoint. It was very easy set up and works well with Alexa! I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: I really love that it had usb option
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time getting a power strip with the usb option and maybe I’m Late to the game but it’s a life saver! I’m soooo over my 13 year old losing all my wall plug ins and my 5 year old constantly stealing and breaking my charges. This made it a lot easier because my kids charge all their eje trounce in one spot! So far it’s been great even with my rough 5 year old and lazy careless teen that pulls plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Hardaman family

customer_reviews.title: I cannot get it to work...
customer_reviews.text: Update .... heyvalue sent me a new power strip and I had no problems hooking it up what so ever. Updated the program and it’s running great! Renamed the outlet with individual names such as light, fan, and so on. I could not hook it up to my wi fi and therefore cannot hook it up to Alexa. Wrote to heyvalue and they wrote back in a reasonable amount of time but I still cannot get it to work. I wish I could I really wanted it to work. I will keep it and keep trying ... wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Igotmail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Power Strip For Its Price
customer_reviews.text: In One sentence : Happy and surprised to have such great product in such a reasonable price. Really really really great power strip with the facility of charge system in it. Charge system is awesome since it charges fast and have enough power supplies system. Excellent materials and great power strip. I will recommend to have this. Thank You amazon and its seller. Great work amazon and its seller.
customer_reviews.author: rsingh14

customer_reviews.title: It's an Okay product
customer_reviews.text: The product works well with Alexa. Alexa was able to discover each port as a separate device aside from the USB ports (they are all on or all off). The fourth power port on my unit does not work very well. The plug must be sitting at the perfect angle for it to work. That is the only problem I had with my unit. If it wasn't for that, this unit is a pretty decent purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tinga Aupiu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my Smart Home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift but ended up keeping it. I already had a Phillips Hue Bridge set up in my home which made set up a million times easier. This application communicates with Alexa and Google Home (I tried both) with ease. As a plus, if you do decide to gift this, it comes packaged very well.. in an easy to wrap box. Honestly this was one of the easiest "smart" items to install. The directions are basically screenshots and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lette

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: After spending way too much time trying to configure/set up/MAKE THIS THING WORK with Alexa, I give up. This product is being returned. I can get Alexa to find the entire strip but not the individual outlets. Which makes it worthless. Instructions are non-existent. There are many questions and answers relating to this issue. So I’m not the only one. Product seems cheaply made. So not worth my time or money.
customer_reviews.author: JayLynn

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice, but won't pair up with Google Home. Now I can't return it!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent hours trying to get this to work, because it seems like a well-made product. Google Help has suggested contacting the manufacturer, which I have done twice. The first response just reviewed the setup instruction, and I haven't received a second response after more than a week. A big disappointment. Now I find out that my return option has expired while I was waiting for responses. Shame on you, Amazon! I'm off to Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Lord

customer_reviews.title: Actually does what it says and more!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several power strips that claim Alexa integration (even ones "certified") only to be disappointed but this one works like a gem. Each outlet can be operated or programmed independently. The 4 USB ports are considered a single power block so there's that, but I honestly haven't had a problem with that. The cord length is perfect to fit under desks or behind the couch as well. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power strip timer with a fantastic easy to use app for control!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to control the lights on my bearded dragon enclosure. It has been fantastic. I can set the on/off times for each individual outlet on the power strip using the app on my phone. I get alerts on my phone when the lights are turned on and off and can easily control everything no matter where I am. I’m not sure how I lived without this device, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Neuro

customer_reviews.title: Broken After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working about 2 months in. The app version is up to date and this never goes online anymore. It’s always offline no matter how many times you refresh or restart your phone. This becomes useless after 2 months. Going to write the company on how to resolve the issue. I will update with the results if any.
customer_reviews.author: Thisguy

customer_reviews.title: AVOID! Would not connect to WiFi network
customer_reviews.text: Despite meeting the box's network requirements, this still would not connect at all.... even after hours of trying to troubleshoot this thing. I ended up just running over to Best Buy to pick up a TP Link and it is loads better. Managed to get that one up and running in seconds, and you can price match.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is just me, but I bought two of these and they don't really work. Sometimes I can get some of them to work, but typically, none of the outlets work. To make matters worse, I wanted to use this when I originally set it up for my wifi - but as far as I can tell it makes you connect to the wifi in order to set it up and turn outlets on...which you cannot do if your wifi is down because you're trying to use this power strip for the wifi. I feel like I was scammed to be honest. I mean they are worthless to me right now and I've had them for 31 days.
customer_reviews.author: nino chiarello

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: Smart outlets are great for home automation. It took seconds to connect, I use the jinvoo app but there are many others out there that work. Once you have you app linked to google home easy to control through google home as well. Only potential improvement would be to have individual manual power on off buttons for each outlet but then you would have to pay more. It is great for the price, I will update if any issues down the road
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: A must have smart plug!
customer_reviews.text: Do you ever find yourself lying on the bed sleepy and don't want to get up to close the lamp or any sort of electronics? And you still have to because there's no remote for such things. With this smart wifi plug, you no longer have to get up! Just turn on/off everything on the phone! The setup was easy and it works flawlessly! One thing to note is this thing only supports 10A, so heavy power consumption stuff might not work properly. Totally recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Li

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple months. Now it doesn't connect to my wifi network and the jinvoo app says it is offline. Light blinks a combination of red and blue. Can't find any documentation as to what that indicates. Tried resetting by holding down the power button. No change.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smart power strip
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I brought smart power strip and I am really loving it! It works perfectly as the regular power strip does. And once you register and connect it to Google Home, you can use voice control to switch on/off on power strip. And also I can control it via my phone. The strip is well designed and looks beautiful, if other people are looking for power strip I will highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It works... sort of
customer_reviews.text: This is a really poorly made cheap unit. The outlets are loose which allows the plugs to flop around loosing connection. I have had several days where my phone and components didn't charge over night and were dead. It feels like it's hollow, very lightweight and just a cheap feel about it. It does work but I don't expect this to last very long. You can do a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: I really love this strip!
customer_reviews.text: This strip is really easy to setup, I thought that I’ll need to go back and fourth during the setup phase but I didn’t do nothing twice, all just worked out from the first time. Button colors are really cool and material is really great! It feels so sturdy and solid. I connected it already with my Alexa although you can also use it using the app that comes with it. It is worth mentioning that this is the first smart strip I ever use, but I’d love to buy it again whenever I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: Good work around
customer_reviews.text: A good work around for my non-smart lamps and speakers. I have some classic lamps which could not be integrated with Alexa but plugging in this will make them smart. I can setup the different code for each socket on it so that I would be able to control different lamps. The only hassle is it only support WiFi 2.4 GHz so that it takes my sometime to set it up. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: ALex

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking right past this smart strip
customer_reviews.text: The app they tell you to use in the instructions does not ever locate tge strip. I called Amazon support ti be sure that I wasn't doing something wrong. He gave up and suggested getting a refund. Finally figured out that the Go Smart app had worked for a few people, and with it was able to use power strip. I love being able to control each plug seperately. The worst part, for me, is that the plugs won't stay plugged in. If you bump or barely move the cord, it loses it's connection. It's very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Grosz

customer_reviews.title: Use Smart Life app, not Jinvoo app!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, works great. Mine is connected via a google home mini. The included instructions say to use the Jinvoo app, but when I tried this app, I was unable to control each plug separately. I then tried it using the Smart Life app, and I am able to control each outlet separately with voice commands! The instructions are exactly the same regardless of which app is used. I'm not sure if this issue occurs if using Amazon Alexa, but it does make a difference with google home. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: worm

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and connection to my phone and wifi. Does what it should do. Very responsive. I dont have to get up to turn on my lights, turn off my photo display or to turn my printer on. The usb ports are all one control all on or all off but each plug outlet can be named and controlled from the app. Can make a off and on schedule for each day individually. I dont use alexa so cant comment on that. But would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and was really easy to set up. It works with my Smart Life App that I use with my other smart plugs. The entire strip connected to Alexa automatically, but I did have to go through both Alexa and the smart life app and set up each individual outlet in order to control them independently from each other. The strip is very sturdy and has little rubber feet to keep it in place. I took off a star because it doesn’t have the holes in the back for wall mounting, which would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Love this Smart Power Strip
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this Smart Power Strip! I can group/control all the outlets on the strip together with Alexa or each outlet individually. It is actually attractive for a power strip. More rectangular not a long skinny strip like most. The strip is exactly as advertised, it arrived 2 days after ordering. I will buy another to use in a different part of my home. Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and control with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my wife, to remove charger clutter. This unit works very well, the usbs all charge at a good rate even with 4 devices charging at once. Setup with Alexa was easy and works well. I haven't tried setting it up with Google so I can't help you there on if it's easy, but I'd assume it is. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: david bozanic

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect power strip for my hobby
customer_reviews.text: I like to do woodworking as a hobby in my garage shop. With a limited number of electrical outlets, this power strip permits me to have multiple power tools "Ready to go" without plugging and unplugging them. I just announce which tool to activate ("Chop saw on"). When I leave, I can turn the power to all the equipment off ("Shop off"). This Smart Power Strip works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Y.Fred F

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.text: Have had now for just over a month and it works great. Love that I can connect up to 4 plugs and control individually or together through my TuyaSmart app. The USB port only has 1 controlled via Wifi, but it is clearly indicated and seems to be working when I tried it out. Currently using the plugs on a daily basis for my daughters room to control various desk lights. Will be purchasing more as it is too easy to use and is much less expensive than individual smart light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, disconnects from WiFi, doesn’t connect well with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: This does not work well at all. I bought it to control a few items from my Alexa Echo Dot. It doesn’t stay connected to WiFi, one of my two would just never connect at all. They don’t even work well as a traditional power strip as it randomly shuts off. I can’t return so I don’t even know what to do with them
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: love my new gadget
customer_reviews.text: just moving into a new place, bought smart light bulb and this smart power strip. it can connect with my echo dot (of course i just got it also), i can control in my app, convenient for me to turn on something like my little heater at night time without getting up (SF is always cold at night)...all i can say is new technology make me more lazier...lol
customer_reviews.author: 👧VJD🥰

customer_reviews.title: Worth Product Ever DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: My people PLEASE beware and DO NOT purchase this product!!! I tired to use it and it would not work AT ALL! I wish I could return it and get my money BACK! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT NOT EVERRRRRRR!!!! #SingleMomChronicles
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Loose outlets but does work with WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Decent value for money. Especially considering works with WiFi. Still having trouble getting Alexa to work with it and the actual prong outlets feel too large. My plugs wobble around while plugged in and slip out way too easily. In fact if I turn it upside down, cords just fall out. That’s the main reason not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Would like it if it actually worked
customer_reviews.text: Just now i opened it and it didnt work.. Wasrw
customer_reviews.author: jLLybe

customer_reviews.title: Was great in ‘18...now not so much in ‘20 :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these strips April of 2018 and they worked wonderfully until now. 2 no longer work on the app. It can no longer find them when I try to pair it back up. I am afraid to delete the app and reinstall because I don’t want to unpair the one that does still work. Really quite annoying and I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B

customer_reviews.title: so far awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's been just 2 days and it is currently working with the app and google home. i use it for my aquarium schedules for light and stuffs. So far I have had no issues. There was however a point when I was setting up, my circuit tripped. I think I tried to plug in the outlet in reverse (which it should not have allowed).
customer_reviews.author: apzon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic one!!I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m looking for charging station which has USB charger in it! This is exactly what I want really nice quality and the white color looks clean and this one You can power off with a button .Absolutely love love it my husband like it because they have a 4 USB charger on top of it!
customer_reviews.author: baoyingzhao

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: It's convenient to have 4 USB , I can have my home camera . my air frier and my oven all charge on my dinning table. So far it works well and don't have any problem. Would love to get Alexa and see how it works. I get this in advance cause if the price has no difference, it's always good to have something innovated.
customer_reviews.author: nikomini

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup. Voice and app control works well...
customer_reviews.text: Simple and fast setup with Android using the Smart Life app. No connectivity issues at all. Google Home interfaces easily with Smart Life and I expect Alexa devices wouldn't have any issues either. You have individual control over each of the four AC three-prong outlets and control of the four USB charging ports as a group. The entire power strip, including USB ports can also be turned off or on as well. With a one year warranty from Pinlo, this smart power strip is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Feeing
customer_reviews.text: I gave is 3 stars because it was easy to setup and so far is working as advertised. The problem I have is the quality,it is extra lightweight borderline flimsy looking and my plugs will fall out of it if I move it much. I have it behind a cabinet so it won't be moved much so its working. When pushing the cabinet back the power plugs would just slip out, same as when you buy a dollar store surge protector. I question how long it will last for me.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I love the future!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but be aware that you will have to do a second discovery session through Alexa to find all the individual plugs as separate devices. If you rename them after that, you will have to discover them again. Four star instead of five because the prongs are a little loose after they are plugged into the strip. They should fit snugly and not pull back or wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The app that control the power is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The phone app where i have the control of the power strip is amazing. I love the individual control for each plugin. I was amaze that i can turn on/ off each off those plugin. And save electricity when not using all the plugin or worry about it when not home. I can now control it when im away too. I dont have to be in the same room and just use the app. Awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrian Harbison

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options for plugs!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice smart power strip. I love how this one comes with USB ports to immediately charge whatever I need without another socket being taken up. I am very pleased. I can plug in multiple electronics at once and charge my phone. Peace of mind is worth a lot, knowing I have good protection for all. The alexa & google assistant compatibility is a plus. Would recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: AngeL❤

customer_reviews.title: It's a Piece of Junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a lot of other folks who bought this power strip, I was hoping it would work. Nope. This is a piece of junk. The stupid thing would not pair. I'm sending it back and getting my money back!
customer_reviews.author: D. Holak

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay connected. Disconnects every 3 or 4 minutes and shuts off everything. Reset, updated firmware a couple times. It's a shame, set-up was very simple, great price but worthless because of the connection issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. goff

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: WAS easy to link  and love the 4 usb ports! Now WON'T link to app at All CRAP
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It kept going off line and now won't connect at all. POS. DON'T BUY! Really easy to link up with Google Home thru another Smart Life app. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laudone

customer_reviews.title: I had an issue getting this Smart Power Strip connected to the app
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue getting this Smart Power Strip connected to the app. It would not auto connect. I had to manual set it up. It work fine for a few days, but then it would not stay connected to the app. I had to uninstall the app and install it again and set up everything twice. So I have decided to return and search for a better Smart Power Strip.
customer_reviews.author: Gman611

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy enough to do after downloading the app. Worked for a couple of weeks and then dropped the wifi and wouldn't connect to it again no matter what I tried. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Mackey Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No circuit breaker
customer_reviews.text: It accepts a wide voltage range (up to 240v) to output 120v through-putting up to 10 amps. However, it has no circuit breaker, so I am uncertain how well it will survive voltage or amperage stress or how it protects itself from surges, or if it can recover from any cutoffs due to stress.
customer_reviews.author: David Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Faulty One- Need Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything until it stopped working completely after a month. Have tried a few different outlets and troubleshooting. I’ve tried reaching out to their customer service twice and no response. The number on the website is not a working number anymore either. If I get some service, my review would go up to 5 stars because it was terrific.. when it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Won't work with my phone
customer_reviews.text: I have Android version 5.1.1 but it totally refuses to accept any password I specify. I tried twice spending an hour each time and I am giving up on it. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: ken wells

customer_reviews.title: Great power strip
customer_reviews.text: This power strip is awesome!! I have synced it with my home stuff and I can set a timer to have it be turned off and back on again, so I don’t have to worry about plugging and unplugging things. I feel like the overall quality is great, just a bit expensive, but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very clean looking surge protector!
customer_reviews.text: I do not really use the smart features that much since it is used as a charging station in our main family room. Looks great, and with our baseboards being white this blends in perfectly. It also charges phones very well, and the leds makes it nice to see if there is or isn’t power being supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: When I received the goods, I was very surprised, because it looked very advanced, pure white, and it could directly charge the data cable, which was exactly what I needed. I had many of them only had data lines without head. In the past, they could only be charged one by one, but now they can be charged together
customer_reviews.author: tingwei

product_meta.title: Smart Power Strip, Wifi Surge Protector, Voice Control with Alexa & Google Home, 4 AC Outlets 4 USB Port with 6-Foot Cord, App Control Appliances, Individual Control, Timing Schedule, No Hub Required
feature_bullets: ALEXA & GOOGLE ASSISTANT COMPATIBLE-This smart power strip support voice control (Alexa device and Google Home Assistant device sold separately)

4 AC OUTLETS + 4 USB PORTS-Equipped with 4 outlets and 4 USB charging port for travel, home or office, provide a convenient power supply for home appliances such as fan, water dispenser, electric pot, TV, light, holiday decorating lights.You never come home to a dark house. Schedule the fan to turn on before you arrive. Sync lights and devices to sunrise, or pre-set times automatically ( NOTE: the 4 Outlets can be controlled individual ;4 USB ports are controlled as a one unit)
APP CONTROLLED-Free "Smart Life" app control the smart power strip by your smartphone and tablet (iOS 8.0 or above/Android 4.4 or above). Support 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network, not support 5.0GHz

SCHEDULE APPLIANCES & INDEPENDENT CONTROL-Schedule your appliances turn on or off anytime to fit your intelligent life and separately control each outlet as needed. Each smart outlet can be set up to 20 timing tasks. Support up to 30 smart phones control

SAFE & ENERGY SAVING-Smart power strip No hub required, Wi-Fi enable, Remote control your daily electrical equip with Security via Voice Control when you are indoor. There provide UL certification.Built in leakage, overload protection switch, product support Surge Protection, effective absorption of the sudden huge energy, protect the connection equipment from damage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,781 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
